2132.subject: BUS
2132.descrlong: Builds upon the student abilities developed in BUS 221 or equivalent course with continued emphasis on writing and oral communication through assignments involving critical analysis, reasoning and research. Ethical philosophical frameworks are introduced, which students reflect upon and apply throughout the course in multiple assignments. Develops student ability to evaluate various types of evidence as well as identify common reasoning fallacies. (Offered every semester).
